description: Obtains information about the directory snapshots that belong to this account. This operation supports pagination with the use of the NextToken request and response parameters. If more results are available, the DescribeSnapshots.NextToken member contains a token that you pass in the next call to  DescribeSnapshots to retrieve the next set of items. You can also specify a maximum number of return results with the Limit parameter.

parameters.name: SnapshotIds
parameters.description: A list of identifiers of the snapshots to obtain the information for. If this member is null or empty, all snapshots are returned using the Limit and NextToken members. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Snapshots
nested_items.description: The list of  Snapshot objects that were retrieved.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The descriptive name of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the snapshot was taken.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If not null, more results are available. Pass this value in the NextToken member of a subsequent call to  DescribeSnapshots.
